oauthConsumerKey.description: The oauth consumer key of your twitter app: https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/basics/authentication/oauth-1-0a

oauthConsumerSecret.description: The oauth consumer secret of your twitter app: https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/basics/authentication/oauth-1-0a

oauthToken.description: The oauth token of your twitter app: https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/basics/authentication/oauth-1-0a

oauthTokenSecret.description: The oauth token secret of your twitter app: https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/basics/authentication/oauth-1-0a
